<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="gameSkin" width="640" height="1030" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" source="gameBg_png" x="0" y="0" touchEnabled="true" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image source="timer_png" y="13" x="242"/>
	<e:Image source="music_png" x="560.72" y="10.52"/>
	<e:Label id="playTime" text="00:00" y="22.52" anchorOffsetX="0" width="91.82" anchorOffsetY="0" height="43.64" horizontalCenter="26" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="startSkin" width="640" height="1030" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<w:Config id="159248772bf"/>
	<e:Image source="startBg_png" x="0" y="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Image id="startBtn" source="start_png" y="950" anchorOffsetX="114" x="320" anchorOffsetY="45" height="90" scaleX="0" scaleY="0"/>
	<e:Image id="gameStage" y="772.16" anchorOffsetX="0" source="stage_png" x="84"/>
	<e:Image id="light" source="light_png" y="0" width="520" anchorOffsetX="260" x="320" scaleX="1" rotation="0"/>
	<e:Image id="shadow" source="shadow_png" y="783.27" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="hand1" source="hand1_png" x="371" y="504" scaleX="0" scaleY="0" alpha="1" height="160" anchorOffsetX="134" anchorOffsetY="80"/>
	<e:Image id="hand2" source="hand2_png" x="371" y="504" alpha="1" scaleX="0" scaleY="0" anchorOffsetX="134" anchorOffsetY="80"/>
	<e:Image id="star" source="star_png" y="140" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" alpha="0" height="670" width="585" x="28"/>
	<e:Group id="startGroup" width="640" height="600" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetY="600">
		<e:Image id="title" source="title_png" y="0" x="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Image id="lip" source="lip_png" x="145" y="490" scaleX="0" scaleY="0" anchorOffsetX="32" anchorOffsetY="28"/>
		<e:Image id="parts" source="parts_png" x="470" y="510" anchorOffsetY="61" scaleX="0" scaleY="0"/>
		<e:Image id="head" source="head_png" x="426" y="454" width="110" height="140" anchorOffsetX="55" anchorOffsetY="40" scaleX="0" scaleY="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="music" source="music_png" x="599" y="39" width="50" height="45" anchorOffsetX="25" anchorOffsetY="22.5"/>
</e:Skin>
